item.title: The SEM Study is Hiring a Post-Doc (2 year)
item.description: Download this as a pdf Job Posting: Postdoctoral Associate, Seminary to Early Ministry Project General Information The Seminary to Early Ministry Study, a joint initiative between Duke Divinity School and the Duke Global Health Institute, invites applications for a Postdoctoral Associate. The initial appointment will be made for one year beginning on July 1, 2021, with an additional year available upon satisfactory performance. The Seminary to Early Ministry Study is the first major longitudinal study examining divinity school education.
